director.name: 尼潘·查恰嫩蓬 Nipan Chawcharernpon

this_title: เลิฟ-เดอะเทอทีน
introduction: Five short films on different kinds of loveLook for Me at Dusk: A journey of opposing father and son to escape the clash of a meteoriteUnfriend: Two close friends ‘unfriend’ each other in the social media due to jealousyChin Love 13:5: A romantic relationship turns sour when one neglects the mutual pactMUTE: A rural school teacher tries best to give a scholar equality to Mee a mute studentRak (Mai) Gao: A father of one kid who suffers from the memories before his wife’s death
foreign_title: เลิฟ-เดอะเทอทีน
